sourcesContent: document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function (event) { // Validate that all variables exist if (toggle && nav && bodypd && headerpd) { toggle.addEventListener("click", () => { // show navbar nav.classList.toggle("show"); // change icon toggle.classList.toggle("bx-x"); // add padding to body bodypd.classList.toggle("body-pd"); // add padding to header headerpd.classList.toggle("header-pd"); }); } }; showNavbar("btn-toggle", "nav-bar", "body-pd", "header"); const linkColor = document.querySelectorAll(".nav__link"); function colorLink() { if (linkColor) { linkColor.forEach((l) => l.classList.remove("active")); this.classList.add("active"); } } linkColor.forEach((l) => l.addEventListener("click", colorLink)); });
